snippet.title: Merlion Pinball - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Merlion Pinball by Hosay Studios

Merlion Pinball is a fast paced and entertaining pinball game with a uniquely Singapore theme.

★ Features ★
- Excellent pinball experience with responsive gameplay.
- Gorgeous high definition graphics and animations featuring famous landmarks in Singapore.
- Global leaderboard to compete with your peers from around the world
- Hidden bonus stages for maximum fun.
- Support all iOS devices including the new iPhone 5 with a single download!

★ Coming soon ★
- Facebook Sharing of high score
- More bonus stages to be added

★ Staying in touch ★
Merlion Pinball is the first game developed by Hosay Studios. Support us so that we can continue to make more uniquely Singapore games. =)
Check us out at: www.hosaystudios.com
Join us on Facebook at: facebook.com/hosaystudios

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/merlion-pinball/id599402810

Homepage:

http://www.hosaystudios.com/
